<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_extension_point"><sys_extension_point action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>sn_cpg_filter.FilterCMPResourceOperation</api_name><description/><example><![CDATA[var FilterCMPResourceOperation = Class.create();
FilterCMPResourceOperation.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    process: function(/*array*/ data) {
        data.push("new entry");
        return data;
    },
	
	filterResourceOperation : function(operations, ci, table) {
		gs.info("I am here");
		operations = new sn_cpg_filter.FilterUtils().filterResourceOperations(operations,ci,table);
		return operations;
	},

    type: 'FilterCMPResourceOperation'
};]]></example><name>FilterCMPResourceOperation</name><restrict_scope>true</restrict_scope><sys_class_name>sys_extension_point</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-31 03:41:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d837ff65b370010720b1ec76981c781</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FilterCMPResourceOperation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CPG Resource Operations Filter" source="sn_cpg_filter">0f7fa6a25b330010720b1ec76981c7de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CPG Resource Operations Filter">0f7fa6a25b330010720b1ec76981c7de</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_extension_point_4d837ff65b370010720b1ec76981c781</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-31 06:04:09</sys_updated_on></sys_extension_point></record_update>
